entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus is described as ensuring the continued imprisonment of his sister Ariana. He is also mentioned as sending an owl to Bathilda Bagshot at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ariana dumbledore
entities.description: Ariana is described as being in a pitiful condition and being imprisoned. Her existence is known only to a few outsiders who believe in her 'ill health'.

entities.name: bathilda bagshot
entities.description: Bathilda is described as a celebrated magical historian who has lived in Godric's Hollow for many years. She is also mentioned as being favorably impressed by Albus' paper on trans-species transformation.

entities.name: kendra dumbledore
entities.description: Kendra is described as rebuffing Bathilda when she first attempted to welcome the family to the village.

relationships.description: Albus is ensuring the continued imprisonment of his sister Ariana.
Bathilda is favorably impressed by Albus' paper on trans-species transformation.
